remarks: If an integer divides each of two other integers, it divides any linear combination of them.  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 21-Mar-2011.)
statement: dvds2ln $p |- ( ( ( I e. ZZ /\ J e. ZZ ) /\ ( K e. ZZ /\ M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) ) -> ( ( K || M /\ K || N ) -> K || ( ( I x. M ) + ( J x. N ) ) ) ) $.
